name: PORTAL SURVIVORS: Enchanstrider
description:
Take down numerous monsters and defeat boss monsters with your colleagues to obtain resources in the area you crossed through the portal! Portal Survivors is a casual game with rogue-lite elements. By combining your colleagues' occupations, skills, and magic characteristics delivered to the area you pass through the portal, you can kill a huge number of monsters in a variety of ways.


  • Portal Survivor Features



  • Colleague
Choose companions with a variety of skills and unique skills to make a party



After making a party with colleagues, take the portal and start the battle!




  • Skills and Magic
You can choose to grow your companion's skills and magic by leveling them up through experience points gained through battle.




  • Town
You can manage your adventure group’s abilities, quests, skill trees, etc.!




Fight Through the Portal. and Survive!
